title: Stream: Arthur Beatrice â€“ Working Out
body:
**Arthur Beatrice** release their much anticipated debut album, **_Working Out_**, on Monday 24 February, and have made the record available for streaming in full.

A wonderfully diverse listen, it features previous singles Midland, Carter (Cut) and Grand Union. Check it out below, and pre-order [here](http://po.st/WorkingOutWS).
